actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-1082.
Measure laid on table in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 5164, to amend certain inspection and manning laws applicable to small vessels carrying passengers or freight for hire, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5164 (Small vessel inspection).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 5164, to amend certain inspection and manning laws applicable to small vessels carrying passengers or freight for hire, and for other purposes.
